preconditions.precondition: Employee identified the need for Github training
Resource provided access to Github Documentation and Tutorials

mainSequence.step: Employee explores Github functionalities through guided tutorials
Github demonstrates issue tracking and repository management
Employee navigates to assigned issues on Issue Tracker
Issue Tracker queries Github for issues tagged to Employee
Github returns a list of assigned issues to Issue Tracker
Issue Tracker displays assigned issues to Employee
Employee participates in issues by commenting and updating status
